testcase.name: should return a value of 0 for an empty list of barns
should return totalAnimals of 0 for an empty list of barns
should return a value of 50000 for one barn and no animals
should return a value of 51400 for one barn with 2 chickens
should return totalAnimals of 2 for one barn with 2 chickens
should return a value of 107525 for two barns, one with 2 chickens and another with 7 donkeys
should return totalAnimals of 9 for two barns with 2 chickens and 7 donkeys
